column1: Uchi////Majority of the staff were very knowledgeable
column3: it was our first time there and the community table works. It's not your Americanized sushi restaurant. It's one of the authentic sushi Japanese restaurant. I would mind paying that much if I went to other restaurants I've been to in Houston
column4: but this kind is similar to Geisha House in LA quality. Geisha House is more posh
column6: but I like the fact Uchi changes its menu every few days to what is freshly available. Makes it unique
